titleStmt.title: The grand oppressor, or the terror of tithes; first felt, and now confest: By William Erberie.
titleStmt.author: Erbery, William, 1604-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.D. for Giles Calvert, and are to be sold at the sign of the Black Spread-Eagle at the West End of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Section beginning on p.[17] has title: "The sword doubled to cut off both the righteous and the wicked .. 1652".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
